name: Traditional Astrology Framework
description: Traditional astrological interpretative framework based on Hellenistic, Medieval, and Renaissance traditions

approaches.name: Hellenistic Whole Sign
approaches.description: The approach used by Chris Brennan and other traditional astrologers, focusing on whole sign houses, sect, dignity, and traditional rulerships

approaches.name: Medieval Traditional
approaches.description: Medieval approach with emphasis on dignity, reception, and house rulership

approaches.name: Archetypal Astrology
approaches.description: Richard Tarnas' approach combining traditional planetary meanings with archetypal psychology
key_techniques: Planetary archetypes and their complex interactions

lots.Lot of Fortune: Ascendant + Moon - Sun (day charts) / Ascendant + Sun - Moon (night charts)
lots.Lot of Spirit: Ascendant + Sun - Moon (day charts) / Ascendant + Moon - Sun (night charts)
lots.Lot of Eros: Ascendant + Venus - Spirit (day charts) / Ascendant + Spirit - Venus (night charts)
lots.Lot of Necessity: Ascendant + Mercury - Spirit (day charts) / Ascendant + Spirit - Mercury (night charts)
lots.Lot of Courage: Ascendant + Mars - Spirit (day charts) / Ascendant + Spirit - Mars (night charts)
lots.Lot of Victory: Ascendant + Jupiter - Spirit (day charts) / Ascendant + Spirit - Jupiter (night charts)
lots.Lot of Nemesis: Ascendant + Saturn - Spirit (day charts) / Ascendant + Spirit - Saturn (night charts)

triplicity.description: Planet in sign of same element and fitting sect

fall.description: Planet in sign of its fall

detriment.description: Planet in sign opposite its ruler

daySect.description: Diurnal planets, strengthened in day charts

nightSect.description: Nocturnal planets, strengthened in night charts

sectorless.description: Adaptable to either sect depending on position
